panels.content: #### Select collectd as **cloud** and one of the cephmon nodes as **node**
panels.title: Dashboard help
Process Disk IO Throughput(Estimated via SYSCALLS)

title: Cloud Ceph Monitoring
description: Displays metrics exposed from collectd processes (for ceph), ceph plugin, and collectd-ceph-storage python plugin (https://github.com/akrzos/collectd-ceph-storage) in a typical OpenStack Environment
